North Eastern Telecommunications Company (Netco Ltd)Bụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi hibere na 1993 na Bosaaso, isi obodo azụmahịa nke Puntland bụ mpaghara Somalia nwere onwe ya.
Netco bụ nke Ismael Haji Abdi, onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na MBA Mahadum Wisconsin,USA, ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Somali Telecom Group
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta kachasị ukwuu na mpaghara Puntland na-achị onwe ya nke Somalia.
Netco bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepe ngwa ngwa ma too nke ukwuu n'ime afọ 15 gara aga, yana ndị ahịa ugbu a nke ihe karịrị mmadụ 800,000.
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enye ekwentị ụlọ, netwọk ekwentị mkpanaaka na ọrụ ịntanetị..Otu n'ime ebumnuche Netco na-esote bụ ịnye ọkụ eletrik na Puntland niile, ọrụ nke ga-ewere ọnọdụ n'ime afọ ise na-eso ya.
